document.full_text: bp said on wednesday it expected to be back drilling in the gulf of mexico in the second half of the year, following a drilling ban imposed due to its oil spill last year.
document.title: bp expects to restart drilling in gulf in h2
lines_and_colors: bp said on wednesday it expected to be back drilling in the gulf of mexico in the second half of the year, following a drilling ban imposed due to its oil spill last year.
